item.title: Father Requested Full Custody... And His Ex-Wife And 6-Year-Old Daughter Mysteriously VANISHED
item.description: A careful look at a case where a father sought full custody, and soon after, his ex-wife and young daughter went missing. The overview focuses on the timeline, investigation, and ongoing search while remaining respectful and factual.

item.title: A Case Frozen in Time: Who Took Matt Odom's Life?
item.description: A careful look at the investigation into Matt Odom’s death, examining the evidence, timeline, and unanswered questions in a case that has remained unresolved for years.

item.title: 19-Year-Old Girl Goes Missing 2 Weeks After Moving
item.description: Just two weeks after relocating to start a new chapter of her life, a 19-year-old woman vanished without a trace. This overview carefully examines the timeline leading up to her disappearance, the efforts by loved ones and investigators to find her, and the unanswered questions that continue to weigh heavily on the search.

item.title: Shannon Hercutt Case Remains Unsolved
item.description: In 2009, Shannon Hercutt was found dead in her SUV at the bottom of a cliff in Sevier County, Tennessee. What seemed like an accident was later ruled a homicide staged as a crash. Suspicion centered on her father due to family disputes, but police later said the suspect wasn’t a family member. No arrests have been made, and the case remains unsolved. #truecrime #homicide #mystery

item.title: How LEGO BRICKS Played a Crucial Role in Solving Lucille's Case, 23 Years Later
item.description: Investigators used a surprising clue from LEGO bricks to make a breakthrough in Lucille’s case more than two decades later.

item.title: The Mysterious Case of Elisa Lam
item.description: Elisa Lam was a Canadian student who went missing in 2013 while staying at the Cecil Hotel in Los Angeles. A few weeks later, her body was found in a water tank on the hotel roof under really mysterious circumstances. #truecrime

item.title: Police Left Angie Samota's Case Cold But Not Her BFF!
item.description: A review of the investigation into Angie Samota’s disappearance, examining how authorities handled the case and ongoing developments.
